content: repeat 5 times yo kb k9 sk2togpo 60 st row 45 repeat 5 times yo kb k8 sk2togpo 55 st row 46 repeat 5 times yo kb k7 sk2togpo 50 st row 47 repeat 5 times yo kb k6 sk2togpo 45 st row 48 repeat 5 times yo kb k5 sk2togpo 40 st row 49 repeat 5 times yo kb k4 sk2togpo 35 st row 50 repeat 5 times yo kb k3 sk2togpo 30 st row 51 repeat 5 times yo kb k2 sk2togpo 25 st row 52 repeat 5 times yo kb k1 sk2togpo 20 st row 53 repeat 5 times yo kb sk2togpo 15 st row 54 repeat 5 times kb skpo 10 st cut the black yarn at 10 cm 4 and pass it through the 10 remaining st itches cut the main colour yarn flap on the upper side of the slot using the main colour pick up the 40 stitches from the the flap is made of 14 row of garter stitch edge for row 3 7 and 11 k2 repeat k2tog k4 until the end of the row cast off on row 15 finishing to make the sphere reversible darn the loose yarns into the fabric under 5-6 st and back into a parallel line as neat as possible froggybug spheres english version v2 4/8 generic instructions for spheres between 55 and 160 stitch wide how to use the table after knitting a sample using the trapping the floats at each stitch technique you know how many stitches are required at the widest part of the sphere find that number in the most left column of the table the 2 next columns will tell you how many row in part 1 and the number of stitches in each slice at the end of part 1 the 2 following columns will tell you how many row in part 2 and the number of stitches in each slice at the end of part 2 part 1 no decrease cast on 10 stitches in one or two colours each of the 5 slices is 2 stitches split the 10 stitches on dpn or circular needle repeat 5 times yo kb k until the end of the slice repeat that row until there are x see table stitches in each slice part 2 single decrease every other row repeat 5 times yo kb k until 2 st in the main colour are remaining skpo repeat 5 times yo kb k until the end of the slice repeat that two-row sequence until there are y see table stitches in each slice part 3a single decrease every row repeat 5 times yo kb k until 2 st in the main colour are remaining skpo repeat that sequence 3 times part 3b slot cast off or i-cord cast off or knit flat a garter stitch flap on 2 slices 2 x y cast on 2 x y st see optional techniques for more details part 3c single decrease every row repeat
